title: Schema for the data field of the AppScope event/metric body
description: Metadata about the data within an event or metric.

addrs.title: addrs
addrs.description: IP address(es) of the domain for which the scoped app sent a DNS request.

class_net_rxtx.title: class net.rxtx
class_net_rxtx.description: Subcategory of send and receive operations.

data.title: data
data.description: Specifies whether data was unencrypted (clear) or encrypted (SSL).

domain.title: domain
domain.description: The domain for which the scoped app made a DNS request.

fd.title: fd
fd.description: The file descriptor for an operation.

file_group.title: file_group
file_group.description: The group ID of the file owner.

file_owner.title: file_owner
file_owner.description: The user ID of the file owner.

file_perms.title: file_perms
file_perms.description: The permissions of the file, in octal format.

file_read_bytes.title: file_read_bytes
file_read_bytes.description: The number of bytes of data read from a file.

file_read_ops.title: file_read_ops
file_read_ops.description: Count of individual read operations aggregated.

file_write_bytes.title: file_write_bytes
file_write_bytes.description: The number of bytes of data written to a file.

file_write_ops.title: file_write_ops
file_write_ops.description: Count of individual write operations aggregated.

host.title: host
host.description: Hostname for the host on which the scoped app was run.

http_client_duration.title: http_client_duration
http_client_duration.description: Time elapsed between when a request was issued and when the response was received, in milliseconds.

http_client_ip.title: http_client_ip
http_client_ip.description: IP address of the host that issued an HTTP request or received the response.

http_flavor.title: http_flavor
http_flavor.description: Specifies whether an HTTP request or response is in HTTP/1.1 or HTTP/2.0.

http_frame.title: http_frame
http_frame.description: Type of the HTTP/2 frame as described in RFC 7540.

http_host.title: http_host
http_host.description: Hostname of the host to which an HTTP request was sent; or, from which a response was received.

http_method.title: http_method
http_method.description: Specifies the method of an HTTP request in the data; e.g., GET, POST, PATCH, etc.

http_response_content_length.title: http_response_content_length
http_response_content_length.description: Specifies the length in bytes of the HTTP response body.

http_scheme.title: http_scheme
http_scheme.description: Specifies whether data was unencrypted (HTTP) or encrypted (HTTPS).

http_server_duration.title: http_server_duration
http_server_duration.description: Time elapsed between when a request was received and when the response was issued, in milliseconds.

http_status_code.title: http_status_code
http_status_code.description: Specifies the status code of an HTTP response.

http_status_text.title: http_status_text
http_status_text.description: The standard text that accompanies an HTTP response status code.

http_target.title: http_target
http_target.description: In a URL, the path or file after the FQDN.

http_user_agent.title: http_user_agent
http_user_agent.description: HTTP header property describing the web client.

localip.title: localip
localip.description: The IP address portion of the local end of a network connection.

localn.title: localn
localn.description: Inode number for the local end of a UNIX domain socket.

localp.title: localp
localp.description: The port portion of the local end of a network connection.

message.title: message
message.description: The textual data written to a console or file.

net_bytes_recv.title: net_bytes_recv
net_bytes_recv.description: The number of bytes of data received over a network connection.

net_bytes_sent.title: net_bytes_sent
net_bytes_sent.description: The number of bytes of data sent over a network connection.

net_close_reason.title: net_close_reason
net_close_reason.description: Specifies which end of a network connection initiated the closing of the connection.

net_protocol.title: net_protocol
net_protocol.description: First network protocol detected from data sent or received.

net_host_ip.title: net_host_ip
net_host_ip.description: The IP address portion of the local side of a network connection.

net_host_port.title: net_host_port
net_host_port.description: The port portion of the local side of a network connection.

net_peer_ip.title: net_peer_ip
net_peer_ip.description: The IP address portion of the remote side of a network connection.

net_peer_port.title: net_peer_port
net_peer_port.description: The port portion of the remote side of a network connection.

unix_peer_inode.title: unix_peer_inode
unix_peer_inode.description: Inode number for the remote end of a UNIX domain socket.

net_transport.title: net_transport
net_transport.description: Network layer used (before the dot) and transport layer used (after the dot).

op_fs_close.title: op_fs_close
op_fs_close.description: The close operation that was executed on the filesystem.

op_fs_delete.title: op_fs_delete
op_fs_delete.description: The delete operation that was executed on the filesystem.

op_fs_open.title: op_fs_open
op_fs_open.description: The open operation that was executed on the filesystem.

op_fs_read.title: op_fs_read
op_fs_read.description: The read operation that was executed on the filesystem.

op_fs_seek.title: op_fs_seek
op_fs_seek.description: The seek operation that was executed on the filesystem.

op_fs_stat.title: op_fs_stat
op_fs_stat.description: The stat operation that was executed on the filesystem.

op_fs_write.title: op_fs_write
op_fs_write.description: The write operation that was executed on the filesystem.

pid.title: pid
pid.description: The process ID of the scoped app.

port.title: port
port.description: Network port opened before a connection was initiated, or closed after the connection closed.

proc.title: proc
proc.description: The name of the process of the scoped app.

proc_cgroup.title: proc_cgroup
proc_cgroup.description: The control group used in container creation.

proc_gid.title: proc_gid
proc_gid.description: The group ID of the user who started the scoped app.

proc_uid.title: proc_uid
proc_uid.description: The user ID of the user who started the scoped app.

proto.title: proto
proto.description: The transmission protocol that the scoped app used to send data.

proto_tcp.title: proto_tcp
proto_tcp.description: The transmission protocol that the scoped app used to send data.

proto_udp.title: proto_udp
proto_udp.description: The transmission protocol that the scoped app used to send data.

protocol.title: protocol
protocol.description: Protocol detected in data transmitted over a network connection.

remoteip.title: remoteip
remoteip.description: IP address for the remote end of a network socket.

remoten.title: remoten
remoten.description: Inode number for the remote end of a UNIX domain socket.

remotep.title: remotep
remotep.description: Port for the remote end of a network socket.

summary.title: summary
summary.description: When true, indicates that the metric value is an aggregation.

unit_byte.title: byte
unit_byte.description: Indicates that the metric's value is in bytes.

unit_connection.title: connection
unit_connection.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a number of connections.

unit_file.title: file
unit_file.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a number of files.

unit_instance.title: instance
unit_instance.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a number of instances.

unix_local_inode.title: unix_local_inode
unix_local_inode.description: Inode number for the local end of a UNIX domain socket.

unit_kibibyte.title: kibibyte
unit_kibibyte.description: Indicates that the metric's value is in kibibytes.

unit_microsecond.title: microsecond
unit_microsecond.description: Indicates that the metric's value is in microseconds.

unit_millisecond.title: millisecond
unit_millisecond.description: Indicates that the metric's value is in milliseconds.

unit_operation.title: operation
unit_operation.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a number of operations.

unit_percent.title: percent
unit_percent.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a percentage.

unit_process.title: process
unit_process.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a number of processes.

unit_request.title: request
unit_request.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a number of a requests.

unit_thread.title: thread
unit_thread.description: Indicates that the metric's value is a number of threads.

x_appscope.title: x-appscope
x_appscope.description: Value of the `x-appscope` HTTP header (if present).
